state I'm talking about the entire plan
and the other side of the plane is
getting rid of the central bank and
we've been talking about this for quite

queue really doesn't mention the Federal

and pretty much stays quiet about it but

minuchin he's out there warning China
not to engage in a competitive

and of course Christine Lagarde is out

was out there saying that yes China is

can start to see the picture of what

here I mean let's start from the

so when the hammer came down and when it

let's look at the central bank Trump

the first thing he pretty much said was
I thought this was going to be an easy

placed this person in this position
without knowing what Powell was going to

he is saying that the Fed is making a

by being too aggressive he said the Fed
